title: Snap Gallery Demo
aboutText:
Welcome to the Snap Gallery demo site! :)

Through here you can get an idea of what snap gallery looks like and how it works.

When you exit this modal you can select what content you'd like to see from the top navbar, or click the button below to get started from the very first page.

pages.altText: A rendering of a yellow ship in outer space.
